summary: texture replacement of \"golden\" dwemer armor to silver colored armor (slightly more worn & scratched)
descriptionHtml:
\"Silverish Dwarven Armor\"

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

\"Silverish Dwarven Armor\" replaces the gold/bronze dwemer armor texture to a more steel/iron/silverish look  (while still maintaining some of the bronze detailing) with slightly more scratches. The mod contains the whole dwarven armor for male (!) characters, consisting of helmet, armor, gauntlets & boots. (Note: Affects all dwarven armors in the game!) May look slightly different in your skyrim as I\'m using FXAA injector, and hadn\'t tested it in vanilla.

This mod is just a simple texture replacement, and took not longer than 1,5 hours. You may, of course, use them for your own mods/projects. The reason I made this mod is that I disliked the recent look of my brutal, vicious and unsocial lvl 16 melee orc.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you find any problems with the mod, or have suggestions to improve it, feel free to leave a comment. If you\'d also like a female version of this mod leave a message likewise, and I\'ll see what I can do. Once the CK is out, I\'ll probably make this a stand-alone armor that doesn\'t replace the bronze vanilla dwemer armor, crafted from less dwemer ingots and more iron and steel.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

>> Installation

Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files.
Move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.

You can find the Skyrim folder here: Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

To those who are new to using Elder Scrolls mods:

- You do not have to extract the .bsa archives. The folder provided by
this mod has the same structure as the inside of the .bsa archive, it will
override the textures that are included in the .bsa file.
- Do not worry about the Data folder that already exists, the folder provided
by this mod will be merged with the existing folder, it will not be overwritten.

>> Uninstallation

Remove the following files:

Data\\textures\\armor\\dwarven\\m\\dwarvenarmor.dds
Data\\textures\\armor\\dwarven\\m\\dwarvenboots.dds
Data\\textures\\armor\\dwarven\\m\\dwarvengauntlets.dds
Data\\textures\\armor\\dwarven\\m\\dwarvenhelmetmale.dds

(Install/Uninstall notes copied from XCE by xenius)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

wirkoenntenaber

Changelog:

>> v0.8 Uploaded Mod
>> v0.9 Improved Helmet Tint
